name: NotLoader
description:
The Project

Basically, this is just a small project I made in a few days because I was inspired by hook based movement in games. So I just went ahead and made my own little game.

Some of the gameplay is similar to Floating Point, as it was a close parallel and helped give me direction on the gameplay. If you have any issues, feel free to say so. The game was/is only a small project, so I might not fix or update this all that often.
